author: Mehboob Jeelani
text:
The two estranged factions of Netaji’s family welcomed the declassification of files even as they maintained their differences over the details of his death.

While Bose’s daughter, Anita Bose Pfaff, accepted the government’s narrative, a section of Bose’s grandnephews and grandnieces rejected it, saying the truth about the death had been “suppressed.” Chandra Kumar Bose, one of Bose’s grandne-phews, said the declassification was a positive move as it opened several windows to find out if he had truly died in a plane crash.

Sugata Bose, another grand nephew, said Prime Minister Modi should reach out to his Japanese counterpart, Shinzo Abe.
title: Family members welcome move
